name: Neon Cube Beta
description:
A Cube Runner Game.

10 different levels.

2 different modes.

A endless runner mode.

A shooting mode.

Different Powerups.

Controls for Levels and Free Mode: A&D to move and Space to use Powerup.

Controls for Shoot mode:

Player 1: WASD to move and "Space" to shoot.

Player 2: Arrow Keys to move and "/" to shoot.
